name: The Sinister CEO: Bob Multiple Choice Quiz | Heroes | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Robert Bishop.

	Bob's full name was revealed during an event at the same time as the episode "Four Months Ago" aired. "Four Months Ago" originally showed on 12 November 2007. Bob's full name was also mentioned in the episode "Cautionary Tales", which aired 19 November 2007.

Alchemy.

	Bob displayed his power ever so briefly in "Four Months Later", to an astonished Mohinder Suresh (Sendhil Ramamurthy). The season premiere, it aired 24 September 2007. When Sylar took Bob's power in "The Butterfly Effect", which aired on 22 September 2008, he was seen carrying a gold gun.

questions.text: Whose medical bills does Bob pay for?
questions.explanation:
D.L.'s medical bills

	D.L. (Leonard Roberts) was shot by Mr. Linderman (Malcolm McDowell) in the first season finale, requiring a lengthy stay in the hospital. He then offers Niki a job, which she refuses. This detail was revealed in "Four Months Ago".

questions.text: Where did Bob first make contact with Mohinder?
questions.explanation:
Egypt.

	Mohinder gave a speech on his father's work to a largely dismissive audience, but noticed Bob, who had been to several of his lectures before. Bob offered to help Mohinder with his research, showing exactly how the Company gets its finances. These events happened in "Four Months Later".

questions.text: When the audience first sees Bob in Isaac's loft in "Kindred", what magazine is he reading?
questions.explanation:
"9th Wonders!".

	Bob is reading the 14th issue of Isaac's "9th Wonders!" comic book while waiting for Mohinder. Bob turned Isaac's loft into Mohinder's new lab, which is under constant surveillance. "Kindred" aired on 8 October 2007.

questions.text: Whom did Bob want injected with a new strain of the Shanti Virus?
questions.explanation:
Monica Dawson.

	Bob orders Mohinder to test the new version on Monica, but he refuses, instead destroying the Virus. Bob then brings Monica home to New Orleans, giving her an iPod full of videos so that she can learn many new skills. These events took place in "The Line", which debuted on 29 October 2007.

questions.text: After Mohinder confesses that he has been working with Noah Bennet to destroy the Company, what is Bob's reaction?
options: He tells Mohinder that he has known all along
questions.explanation:
He gives Mohinder a gun.

	Mohinder confessed in "Out of Time", which also saw a foiled attempt on Bob's life by Maury Parkman. In this episode, which aired on 5 November 2007, Bob finds out that the Shanti Virus has mutated into something Mohinder's blood cannot cure.

Elle.

	The relation is revealed in "Cautionary Tales" although Elle was introduced in "Fight or Flight", which aired 22 October 2007. Elle is a mentally unstable young woman who can generate bolts of electricity.

questions.text: What does Bob give to the Bennet family?
questions.explanation:
Noah's ashes.

	Noah had been shot in the eye toward the end of "Cautionary Tales", but was brought back to life thanks to Claire's blood. However, his family was kept in the dark about his revival for the time being, allowing Bob to give the family some false ashes.

questions.text: Bob has been with the Company for thirty years.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Bob is the head of Operations for the Company and has been with them since their inception in the 1970s. He is one of the twelve that appear in the group photo.
